title: Cannot reset my password
description: I tried to reset my password using the forgot password link but never received the email. I've checked my spam folder as well.

title: Payment failed with credit card
description: My credit card payment keeps failing. The card is valid and has sufficient funds. Error code: PAYMENT_DECLINED

title: Website loads very slowly
description: The website takes more than 30 seconds to load. This has been happening for the past 2 days. My internet connection is working fine.

title: Unable to login to my account
description: I keep getting 'invalid credentials' error even though I'm using the correct username and password. I've tried resetting my password but the issue persists.

title: Refund not received after cancellation
description: I cancelled my subscription 2 weeks ago but haven't received the refund yet. The confirmation email said it would take 5-7 business days.

title: App crashes on startup
description: The mobile app crashes immediately after I open it. I've tried reinstalling but the problem continues. iPhone 12, iOS 17.2

title: How to change my email address
description: I need to update the email address associated with my account but can't find the option in settings.

title: Duplicate charges on my card
description: I was charged twice for the same transaction. Transaction IDs: TXN123456 and TXN123457. Please refund the duplicate charge.

title: Feature request: Dark mode
description: It would be great to have a dark mode option for the app, especially for use at night.

title: Data export not working
description: When I try to export my data, I get an error message saying 'Export failed'. I need my data for my records.

title: Account locked after multiple login attempts
description: My account got locked after I mistyped my password several times. How can I unlock it?

title: Subscription auto-renewed unexpectedly
description: My subscription was auto-renewed even though I had disabled auto-renewal. I want to cancel and get a refund.

title: Missing data after sync
description: After syncing between devices, some of my data is missing. Last sync was yesterday at 3 PM.

title: Cannot update profile picture
description: Whenever I try to upload a new profile picture, I get an error. The image is under 5MB and in JPG format.

title: Wrong amount charged
description: I was charged $99.99 but my plan is supposed to be $79.99 per month. Please correct this and refund the difference.

title: 404 error on dashboard page
description: I keep getting a 404 error when trying to access my dashboard. All other pages work fine.

title: Two-factor authentication not working
description: I enabled 2FA but I'm not receiving the verification codes via SMS. I've tried multiple times.

title: Invoice not generated
description: I need an invoice for my last payment but it's not showing up in my billing history.

title: API rate limit too restrictive
description: The current API rate limit of 100 requests per hour is too low for our use case. Can we increase it?

title: Delete my account and all data
description: I want to permanently delete my account and all associated data per GDPR requirements.

title: Payment method declined
description: I'm trying to add a new payment method but it keeps getting declined. The card works on other websites.

title: Search function returns no results
description: The search bar is not working. No matter what I search for, it returns zero results.

title: Password reset link expired
description: The password reset link I received expired before I could use it. Can you send a new one?

title: Pricing page shows incorrect information
description: The pricing page lists features that aren't available in my plan. This is confusing and misleading.

title: File upload fails for large files
description: I cannot upload files larger than 10MB. The upload progress bar reaches 100% but then fails with a timeout error.

title: Email notifications not being sent
description: I'm not receiving any email notifications even though I have them enabled in my settings.

title: Trial period ended unexpectedly
description: My trial period was supposed to last 30 days but it ended after only 2 weeks.

title: Mobile app not syncing with web
description: Changes I make on the mobile app don't show up on the website and vice versa.

title: Username already taken error
description: During signup, I keep getting 'username already taken' error even when I try unique usernames.

title: Discount code not working
description: I have a 20% discount code (SAVE20) but when I apply it at checkout, nothing happens.

title: Database connection timeout errors
description: Getting frequent database connection timeout errors. This makes the service unusable.

title: Change account owner
description: I need to transfer ownership of this account to a different user. How do I do that?

title: Credit card information not updating
description: I'm trying to update my credit card information but the changes don't save.

title: Images not loading on product pages
description: Product images are not loading. I just see blank placeholders. This happens on all browsers.

title: Cannot link social media accounts
description: The option to link my Twitter and LinkedIn accounts is not working. Button does nothing when clicked.

title: Subscription downgrade pending
description: I requested a subscription downgrade 5 days ago but it still shows as pending. When will it be processed?

title: SSL certificate error
description: I'm getting an SSL certificate error when trying to access the site. Browser says connection is not secure.

title: Account verification email not received
description: I signed up yesterday but never received the account verification email. I've checked spam folder.

title: Billing cycle changed without notice
description: My billing cycle was changed from monthly to annual without my consent or notification.

title: API documentation outdated
description: The API documentation doesn't match the actual API responses. Several endpoints are missing or incorrect.

title: Session timeout too short
description: I keep getting logged out every 15 minutes. Can the session timeout be extended?

title: Tax calculation incorrect
description: The tax amount on my invoice seems wrong. I'm being charged 15% tax but it should be 10% in my state.

title: Memory leak in desktop application
description: The desktop app's memory usage keeps growing over time until it crashes. Windows 11, 16GB RAM.

title: Privacy settings not saving
description: Whenever I change my privacy settings and save, they revert back to default after I refresh the page.

title: Pro features not activated after upgrade
description: I upgraded to Pro plan yesterday and was charged, but I still don't have access to Pro features.

title: Webhook not receiving events
description: My webhook endpoint is not receiving any events. I've verified the URL is correct and accessible.

title: Merge duplicate accounts
description: I accidentally created two accounts with different emails. Can you merge them into one?

title: Payment receipt shows wrong currency
description: My payment receipt shows USD but I paid in EUR. The amount is also converted incorrectly.

title: CORS error in API requests
description: Getting CORS errors when making API requests from my frontend. Access-Control-Allow-Origin header is missing.

title: Cannot access account from new device
description: I'm trying to login from a new laptop but getting 'suspicious activity detected' warning and can't access my account.
